caption:
$39,000,000 WATERFRONT ENTERTAINMENT ICON💥
​
Welcome to… 600 Isle of Palms Dr, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301📍

Welcome to Villa de Palma—an iconic waterfront masterpiece crafted for the elite. Spanning over 15,000 sq.ft. with 300 ft of pristine water frontage, this estate boasts 8 en suite bedrooms, 2 primary suites with spa-inspired baths—one adorned in rare Fijian stone— a garden suite, & 2 private cabana rooms with luxurious baths. Step into soaring double-height ceilings & floor-to-ceiling windows in the grand living spaces. Entertain across 8 elegant bars flowing through indoor & outdoor areas, a wine cellar, second-story terraces, & a rooftop sun deck, even Swarovski crystals shimmer under the stars. Indulge in 2 swimming pools, a lounge pool, 2 hot tubs, fire pit, Saharan-style relaxation room, private gym, library/study, outdoor amphitheater, & expansive al fresco entertaining areas.

🛏️ 8 Bedrooms
🛁 9 Bathrooms | 3 Half Bathroom
📐 14,846 Interior SF | 38,998 Lot SF
🌊 300 Feet of Water Frontage
